    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Calculator
    This class is meant to be used for basic statistical analysis of DataPoint ArrayLists, such as those found in DataSets version 1.0.0
    ConversionCompiler
    This class acts as a compiler of all the different unit converters so that they may be easily accessed by the UnitConverter class.
    ConversionType
    This is an abstract class meant to create the backbone for different unit converters and facilitate smooth operation of the UnitConverter class
    DataPoint
    This class is the basis for the entire Data projects' data structures.
    DataSet
    This class holds lists of DataPoints and contains options for sorting and analyzing them
    Date
    This class is meant to store dates to be used to describe Observations made
    DescribedDataPoint
    This class uses DataPoints to create data containing independent and dependent variables
    DescribedDataSet
    This class holds lists of DescribedDataPoints for sorting and analyzing them
    DescribedDataSetConstructor
    This is a class meant to create DescribedDataSets using formatted command line inputs
    Graph
    I'll get to this class one day if I feel like it
    ImperialConverter
    This is a class meant to convert DataPoints holding imperial units into new DataPoints holding different imperial units, as well as provide a few tools for evaluating imperial units
    ImperialToMetricConverter
    This class is meant to convert metric unit DataPoints to imperial unit DataPoints and vice versa
    ImperialUnits
    This is a class meant to deal with and standardize Strings representing imperial system units
    Main
    Provided Main class for running project code
    MetricConverter
    This is a class meant to convert DataPoints holding metric units into new DataPoints holding different metric units, as well as provide a few tools for evaluating metric units
    MetricUnits
    This is a class meant to deal with and standardize Strings representing metric system units
    Observation
    This class extends DataPoints to also contain the date and times in which they were recorded or created
    ObservationSet
    This class is for DataSets meant specifically for Observation objects
    Time
    This class is meant to store times to be used to describe Observations made
    UnitConverter
    This class is meant to be used to convert one DataPoint to another DataPoint with different units and a proportional measure, as well as to act as a simple guide to the conversion process.
